Name: Clan Wolf-in-Exile
ReputationStatements: Mercenary, we understand that you have found fighting against us profitable in the past, and would like to reverse this with this batchall.
Mercenary, you have fought well against us in the past.  We would like to employ your skills in a task that furthers our goals, and offer you this batchall.
Commander, Clan Wolf-in-Exile have faced you in battle before, and you have proved yourself competent.  Take up this batchall and let us work together in a mutually beneficial way.
Freeborn, you are an unknown to us.  Prove yourself on the field of battle with this batchall, and we may have further use of you.
Commander, you have assisted the Wolf-in-Exile Clan adequately in the past.  Before we take this relationship further, we need you to perform a task for us.
Commander, you have served us admirably in the past.  I offer you this batchall knowing you will perform as well as any of our commanders.
Commander, the Wolf-in-Exile Clan regard you as one of our pack. I have kept this task for you, and would trust no one else to succeed.
MissionSuccessStatements: Well done Commander. Know that the Wolf-in-Exile Clan recognize your service, and I have transferred the agreed payment to your account.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: We expect all the tasks assigned to be completed freeborn.  However, we recognize your attempt, and provide a partial payment for your partial completion of the tasks.
BadFaithFailureStatements: You have failed, and this failure sets back our plans.  Don't expect payment, as none will be provided.
Description: Clan Wolf-in-Exile is a splinter faction of the original Clan Wolf, one of the twenty Clans created by Nicholas Kerensky. Born from the destruction of the original Clan Wolf in the Refusal War, the Wolves-in-Exile continued to uphold the Warden traditions of their forebears under the leadership of Khan Phelan Kell by siding with the Inner Sphere
